features.feature: 亲爱的用户，本次更新主要针对系统进行了优化，推荐您进行更新
• 新增撕拉片水印
• 来电场景支持配置为横幅通知或全屏显示。体验路径：设置 > 应用 > 拨号服务 > 解锁后来电通知
• 支持 Android 原生极暗模式 (降低白点值)。体验路径：设置 > 辅助功能 > 无障碍 > 极暗
• 截屏编辑后保存支持覆盖原图选项
• 优化部分应用导航条沉浸式体验
• 控制中心任意位置支持横划切换至通知中心，操作更方便
• 控制中心新增关机按钮，关机重启更便捷
• 媒体播控卡片新增进度条调节，可随意调整进度
• 定时开关机功能可独立设置
• 提升系统稳定性，让您的手机运行更稳定
• 合入安卓 2025 年 9 月安全补丁，增强系统安全性。有关荣耀软件安全更新内容的信息，请访问荣耀官方网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/support/bulletin/2025/9

1. 本次更新会删除您的用户数据，请您在更新前做好数据备份 2. 门店改制是特殊的 OTA 升级过程，由演示版本升级到商用版本过程中，系统会多次自动重启，当系统处于“开机导航”页面时，改制版本升级才算完成，在出现“开机导航”页面之前，请耐心等待，不要做恢复出厂等操作 3. 更多精彩功能介绍，请访问“玩机技巧”应用 4. 如果您在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请访问“我的荣耀”应用或访问荣耀官方服务网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us 寻求支持
Dear user, this update mainly enhances the system performance. Update to enjoy the improvements
• Camera now includes Peel-apart film watermark
• You can set incoming calls to show as either a banner notification or a full-screen display. Try it out by going to: Settings > Apps > Phone Services > Call notification after unlocking
• Supports Android's native extra dim mode, which reduces the white point value. Try it out by going to: Settings > Accessibility features > Accessibility > Extra dim
• After editing a screenshot, you can save it to replace the original image
• Optimizes the immersive experience of the navigation bar in some apps
• You can swipe horizontally from anywhere in the Control Center to quickly switch to the Notification Center
• Control Center now includes a Power off button, making it easier to power off and restart your device
• The media control card features a progress bar, allowing you to easily adjust the playback
• Scheduled power on/off feature allows you to set Power on and Power off times separately
• Improves the system stability

• Android security patch (Sep 2025) has been incorporated for system security. For more information about Honor Security updates, please visit our website https://www.honor.com/global/support/bulletin/2025/9

1. Installing this update will delete your personal data. Please back up your data before updating 2. Version upgrade is a specific OTA upgrade process. In the process of upgrading from demo version to commercial version, the system will automatically restart several times. The upgrade is only considered complete when the startup navigation screen is displayed. Before that, please wait patiently and do not operate the device or restore it to factory settings 3. Discover more information on product features in Tips 4. If you encounter any issue during use, please get support by going to My Honor or visiting our website at https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us
